name: steatite quarry operation | steatite | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11069/documentation

This datasets represents the production of steatite rock.

Starts from the delivery on site of the material and energy inputs.

This activity ends with the production of either finished steatite products (polished plates and blocks) or raw stones (25% of steatite is sold as finished products, 75% as raw stones).
The dataset includes the whole manufacturing process from extracting to transforming steatite into polished plates and blocks: on-site processes (transport, machinery, energy use, etc.), and plant infrastructure. 
The dataset doesn"t include the amount of water used during sawing; it is assumed  that all water is extracted from and returned to surface waters.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay
tags: Sector: Resource Extraction; Minerals; Cement & Concrete

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data collected, through questionnaire, from the only steatite producer in Quebec.
